snippet.title: Liberals in second try on plebiscite bill
snippet.content:
Paul Osborne, AAP Senior Political WriterAustralian Associated Press
Share
The Liberal Party has agreed to have a second go at seeking parliamentary approval for its same-sex marriage plebiscite. If the plebiscite bill fails, Australian voters will still get a say on the issue via a postal ballot.

sindex.name: AAP Senior Political WriterAustralian Associated Press
